description:
This patch points out the need for this in the v2 API and the need for a test in the v3 API to cover InstanceUserDataMalformed for the server create call.

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/54202/6/nova/api/openstack/compute/servers.py

It was out of scope to add/cover that in that patch, so reporting it as a bug to keep track of it.
title: Need to handle InstanceUserDataMalformed in create server v2 API

comments.content:
This patch points out the need for this in the v2 API and the need for a test in the v3 API to cover InstanceUserDataMalformed for the server create call.

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/54202/6/nova/api/openstack/compute/servers.py

It was out of scope to add/cover that in that patch, so reporting it as a bug to keep track of it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

Branch:    master

commit d5ff12a700495ba6b685cae08a0a8f017e3a976a
Author: Aaron Rosen <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Dec 3 14:46:03 2013 -0800

    Handle InstanceUserDataMalformed in create server v2 api
    
    The following patch adds missing support for handling
    InstanceUserDataMalformed. In addition, it also adds test cases
    in both the v2 and v3 api.
    
    Change-Id: I1b474318248f64eed994f67c6d91db38d5579a63
    Closes-bug: #1257146
